<h1 align="center">
  FarahMint project track
</h1>

 Project Management tool build with React.js and Redux, as well as firebase for the backend with  authentication , storage, cloud function and hoisting functionalities. I am will still doing some modification.

 	1.	Project management applications build with React, Redux & complete with ¬†Firebase authentication and cloud functions for real time notifications‚Ä®
	2.	Firebase firestore use as a real time database to store all the data in
	3.	Firebase cloud functions for notifications when new user signIn or create a project‚Ä®
	4.	Firebase authentication for authentcation flow in the app

 PS: Thanks to ninja web on Youtube who inspired me to expand on this project. 

## üßê What's inside?

A quick look at the top-level files and directories you'll see in my React project.



FOLDER STRUCTURE
( ROOT )

--- index.js

--- app.js

    --- components

        --- AuthForm
            --auth
            --globalForm
            --overlay

        --- dashboard
            --notifications

        --- layout
            --backdrop
            --navbar
            --navLinks
            --siderDrawer

        --- projects
            -- Createproject  
            -- UpdateProject
            -- projectslist 
                  - projectDetails 
                  - projectSummary 
    
    config (firebase configuration)
    store (redux)
